description:
Daddy, we found a stray kitty!  Can we bring him home?
But it even said "Meow, I wanna live with the Maruis!"
Really?  We can keep it?!  Yippee!  We did it, Hitoha!
Let`s go get it now!  Huh?  It`s gone...
I`m sure a really nice, kind person picked it up.
Uh oh, Hitoha`s in shock...can`t we do something, Micchan?
Ah ha, I`LL be the kitty!  Meoooooow!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Day at the Marui House
丸井さんの家庭の日常
